mission.posting: r00t needs your help tracking down a problem on one of her servers. Something is causing it to keep crashing and she cannot figure out why. Use your hacking skills to identify what has happened.

email.subject: The Route of the Problem
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#,
I've got a task for you, I'm currently hosting a website that I built for my friends to use. Only problem is it has been mysteriously crashing recently and I cannot figure out why.
I need you to login to the server and take a look at the logs. See if you can find something/someone that is causing the website to crash. As soon as you do, I want that hacker taken down! So go ahead and connect to him and take his system files!
BATTLEBOARD REMINDER: When you have completed r00t's task she will become an official member of your team.

attachments.note: Identify Hacker from Logs. Delete hacker's systems files and exe tools to stop him.
